general.text-leave-warning-content: We are still working on it. Please do not leave this page.

settings.title: Settings
settings.text-confirm-restore: Are you sure you want to restore the default settings?
settings.text-export-backup: Export two files, one for modification and one for backup.

home.title: Mini Dashboard
home.text-github-files-description: GitHub provides almost infinite storage for files. You can use this feature to store files that are not allowed (because of file size or type) to be uploaded to XYY huijiwiki.
home.text-cartoon-data-description: Export or import Cartoon episode data.
home.text-destroy-and-rescue-description: Delete or restore pages in batches.

github-file.title: GitHub File
github-file.msg-no-preview: Hmm… looks like this file doesn't have a preview we can show you.
github-file.msg-internet-connection-warning: This page requires an internet connection to access GitHub and Cloudflare. If you're in mainland China, you might have trouble connecting.

data-importer.title: Data Importer
data-importer.bot-alert-text: You need to log in with a bot account to import data.
data-importer.bot-alert-is-bot: Current account is a bot account.
data-importer.bot-alert-not-bot: Current account is not a bot account.

search-and-destroy.title: Search and Destroy
search-and-destroy.error-no-destroy-reason: Please fill in the destroy reason

search-and-rescue.title: Search and Rescue
search-and-rescue.error-no-rescue-reason: Please fill in the rescue reason

miui-themes.title: MIUI Themes Collector
miui-themes.description: A tool to collect MIUI theme files, images, and other resources.
miui-themes.step1-login-desc: Login Your GitHub Account and GRANT ORGANIZATION ACCESS of XYY-huijiwiki
miui-themes.step1-permission-denied-content: You don’t have the permission to access the organization XYY-huijiwiki.
